title: 300+ Flat Icons
description: Pack of 332 flat icons suitable for inventory, abilities, armor, menu buttons, statuses, UI. Will work great with mobile type of games as well as game for PC.
longDescription:
What's inside: over 300 various flat icons, which including icons:


ARMOR:

- 14 heavy armor icons,

- 12 light armor icons,

- 13 medium armor icons.


ABILITIES WEAPONS:

- 11 archry skills icons,

- 10 axe skills icons,

- 10 daggers skills icons,

- 10 hammer skills icons,

- 9 shield skills icons,

- 12 sword skills icons.


VARIOUS ICONS:

- 77 icons suitable for inventory and statuses,

- 96 basic buttons which includes controllers buttons (such as mouse, keyboard, consoles pad),

- 10 various cursors,

- 10 types of loading circle

- 4 sliders icons,

- 12 activity icons witch arrows (such as pick/grab/loot etc.).

- 22 bottles/potions icons.


!! IMPORTANT !!

If you’re using engine version older than 5.0 and can’t see icons properly in the Content Drawer; try these solutions:

  1. Change the compression settings to “Displacementmap (8/16bit)".
  2. Edit the icons and set the compression to User Interface and the Quality to UI.

There is no issue in Version 5.0 and higher.



If you have any questions feel free to ask:

Thank you and enjoy!

technicalDetails:
Number of Textures: 332 png icons

Texture Resolutions: 512 x 512 px
